DOC.brief_summary: Female child ( age 8-13 year ) recruit posted flyer , newspaper ad , word mouth Manhattan , KS area . After laboratory assessment , recruit participant randomly assign either healthful eating physical activity skill coach general health education coach intervention condition . For condition , research assistant serve wellness coach deliver 12 intervention session home participate child . Assessments complete baseline , intervention end ( 3 month ) , follow-up ( 6 month ) , comprise biomedical psychosocial measure . Biomedical measurement obtain include : - body composition ( DEXA , tetrapolar bioimpedance , body mass index , waist circumference ) - blood pressure ( automated sphygmomanometer ) , - pulmonary function test ( forced expiratory flow 1-sec , force vital capacity , force expiratory flow 25-75 % vital capacity ) , - unstimulated whole ( mixed ) saliva passive drool detect marker inflammation , - physical activity level ( 7-day accelerometry ) . Psychosocial measurement include : - fruit vegetable consumption ( Child Dietary Questionnaire ) - self efficacy , - enjoyment - quality life ( Peds QL ) . Inclusion criterion : - female - age 8-13 year - parental consent , - reside within 40-minute drive - available 12 home coaching visit three lab assessment . Exclusion criterion - developmental delay psychiatric problem , - illness , injury , condition , disease would prevent participation moderate-to-vigorous physical activity , - take weight-altering medication - participate health behavior change program . The objective study determine - whether type home-based coaching intervention feasible - whether healthful eating physical activity skill coach intervention efficacious , relative general health education coach group , prevent increase body fat percentage , body mass index percentile , waist circumference , systolic diastolic blood pressure , sedentary behavior - whether healthful eating physical activity skill coach intervention efficacious , relative general health education coach group , facilitate increase quality life , moderate-to-vigorous physical activity , enjoyment physical activity fruit vegetable consumption , self-efficacy physical activity fruit vegetable consumption . We hypothesize research project successful recruit retain participate family , train research assistant deliver intervention component , coach condition well receive appreciate participate family . We hypothesize healthful eating physical activity skill coach intervention effective support coach condition prevent increase blood pressure , airway dysfunction adiposity . We expect intervention condition show improvement pediatric quality life measure , healthful eating physical activity skill coach intervention effective general health education coach condition increase physical activity , physical activity enjoyment self efficacy , fruit vegetable consumption , fruit vegetable enjoyment self-efficacy .
DOC.detailed_description: Obesity associate increase chronic disease risk , therefore pose major public health problem ( Lobstein et al. , 2004 ) . In 2011 , Centers Disease Control Prevention estimate obesity affect 12.5 million child teen , 17 % US population . This marked increase ~5 % rate obesity find population late 1960s . Barlow ( 2007 ) point complexity obesity prevention lie less identification target health behavior , much process influence family change behavior habit , culture , environment promote le physical activity energy intake . Obesity prevention intervention may effective sustainable without impact home environment ( Rosenkranz & Dzewaltowski , 2008 ) . Conwell et al . ( 2010 ) suggest home-based program may offer significant advantage center-based program offer good accessibility convenience . Wellness coach show promise improve health behavior relate chronic disease ( Lawn & Schoo , 2010 ) , publish study use wellness coach childhood obesity prevention model home environment . The primary aim trial determine whether home-based wellness coach delivery model feasible obesity prevention intervention strategy community set . The secondary objective determine comparative effectiveness two wellness coaching intervention . Female child ( age 8-13 year ) recruit posted flyer , newspaper ad , word mouth Manhattan , KS area . After laboratory assessment , recruit participant randomly assign either healthful eating physical activity skill coach general health education coach intervention condition . For condition , research assistant serve wellness coach deliver 12 intervention session home participate child . Assessments complete baseline , intervention end ( 3 month ) , follow-up ( 6 month ) , comprise biomedical psychosocial measure . We hypothesize research project successful recruit retain participate family , train research assistant deliver intervention component , coach condition well receive appreciate participate family . We hypothesize healthful eating physical activity skill coach intervention effective support coach condition prevent increase blood pressure , airway dysfunction adiposity . We expect intervention condition show improvement pediatric quality life measure , healthful eating physical activity skill coach intervention effective general health education coach condition increase physical activity , physical activity enjoyment self efficacy , fruit vegetable consumption , fruit vegetable enjoyment self-efficacy .
DOC.criteria: Being female age 8 13 year consent parent guardian Family willing participate homebased behavioral intervention Having developmental delay psychiatric problem . Having illness , injury , condition , disease would prevent participation moderatetovigorous physical activity . Not live within 40 mile Kansas State University campus Manhattan , KS . Taking weightaltering medication , participate weight control program .
